task.title: Force default PostHog host for stars tracking

raw.question: Hardcode PostHog host to US ingest for stars workflow
raw.chosen: Hardcode PostHog host to US ingest for stars workflow
raw.reasoning: User requested fixed default host; removing host override keeps configuration simple and consistent

retrospective.summary: Removed POSTHOG_HOST override and set stars workflow to always post to https://us.i.posthog.com; updated README setup steps
